meanings.definition: To rotate automatically, especially referring to a device or screen adjusting its orientation based on movement or position.
meanings.sent1: My phone can autorotate the screen when I turn it sideways.
meanings.sent2: The camera app on my tablet can autorotate the image when I tilt the device.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally made my phone autorotate the screen while trying to take a picture upside down.
meanings.sent4: The windmill's blades autorotate to catch the wind from different directions.
meanings.sent5: The satellite dish can autorotate to maintain a strong signal during storms.

meanings.definition: The automatic rotation feature on a device or screen.
meanings.sent1: I love the autorotate function on my tablet that adjusts the screen orientation.
meanings.sent2: The autorotate on my camera helps me capture photos in landscape and portrait modes.
meanings.sent3: The autorotate on my TV always surprises me when it changes the display orientation.
meanings.sent4: The autorotate on the projector screen smoothly adjusts to fit the room size.
meanings.sent5: The autorotate on the computer monitor makes it convenient to switch between tasks.
